name: copy-tab
description: Copy all open files with intelligent project structure visualization. Perfect for sharing code with AI assistants (ChatGPT, Claude, Copilot), collaboration, and code reviews. Features: file tree, .gitignore filtering, customizable output, and 9+ configuration options.

copyTab.treeDepth.description: Maximum depth for directory tree visualization (1-10 levels)

enumDescriptions: Show path relative to workspace root (e.g., 'src/components/index.js')
copyTab.filePathFormat.description: Format for displaying file paths in output

copyTab.includeProjectStructure.description: Include project directory tree in clipboard output

copyTab.respectGitignore.description: Filter files and directories using .gitignore patterns

structure.description: Header for the project structure section

contents.description: Header for the file contents section

copyTab.sectionHeaders.description: Customize section headers in the output

enumDescriptions: Sort files and directories alphabetically by name
Sort by type (directories first, then files)
Sort by last modified date (newest first)
copyTab.sortOrder.description: Sort order for files and directories in tree

copyTab.includeLineNumbers.description: Add line numbers to file contents (useful for discussing specific lines with LLMs)

copyTab.fileSeparator.description:
Separator string between files in output (e.g., '
', '
---
', or custom text)

copyTab.fileFilters.description: File patterns to include or exclude. Use glob patterns (e.g., ['*.js', '*.ts'] to include only JS/TS files, or ['!*.test.js'] to exclude test files). Prefix with '!' to exclude.
